item.title: CyberMilesNFT Newsletter- The NFT Boom: Luxury Brands Lead the Digital Fashion Trend?
item.description: The age of digital consumption seems to be changing the marketing model of every industry. Fashion brands seem to transfer to digital networks and technology as a way out of their transformation and upgrading. The luxury group LVMH formed a partnership with Google in June that will use AI to provide personalized services and content in order to enhance user experience. LVMH, Cartierâ€™s parent company Richemont and Prada jointly announced that the three parties plan to create a solution powered by ‘Aura Blockchain’, a global luxury blockchain open to all luxury brands.
